type.name: org.gradle.process.JavaExecSpec
type.description: Specifies the options for executing a Java application.

method.name: args
method.description:
Adds args for the main class to be executed.
param:args Args for the main class.

returns:this

method.name: args
method.description:
Adds args for the main class to be executed.
param:args Args for the main class.

returns:this

method.name: classpath
method.description:
Adds elements to the classpath for executing the main class.
param:paths classpath elements

returns:this

method.name: getArgs
method.description: Returns the arguments passed to the main class to be executed.

method.name: getClasspath
method.description: Returns the classpath for executing the main class.

method.name: getMain
method.description: Returns the fully qualified name of the Main class to be executed.

method.name: setArgs
method.description:
Sets the args for the main class to be executed.
param:args Args for the main class.

returns:this

method.name: setClasspath
method.description:
Sets the classpath for executing the main class.
param:classpath the classpath

returns:this

method.name: setMain
method.description:
Sets the fully qualified name of the main class to be executed.
param:main the fully qualified name of the main class to be executed.

returns:this

property.name: args
property.description: Returns the arguments passed to the main class to be executed.

property.name: classpath
property.description: Returns the classpath for executing the main class.

property.name: main
property.description: Returns the fully qualified name of the Main class to be executed.
